attributes.action: Give resident tenents (i.e those who live with their landlord) the same rights as all other tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the law states that a tenant who live in the same house as their landlord can be made homeless if given 'reasonable' time. This means some body can be thrown on the street for no reason, if the landlord deams it reasonable!
